claims.text: A three-day juice cleanse can bolster the immune system and aid fat loss.
claims.context: Speaker discusses benefits of juice cleanse for health.

claims.text: A three-day juice cleanse can bolster the immune system and aid fat loss.
claims.context: Speaker discusses benefits of juice cleanse for health.

claim_reports.claim_text: A three-day juice cleanse can bolster the immune system and aid fat loss.

refutes.title: Do Juice Cleanses Work - Kelsey-Seybold Clinic
refutes.evidence_summary: The evidence indicates that while juice cleanses may lead to initial weight loss due to calorie restriction, they do not provide compelling support for bolstering the immune system or sustainable fat loss, as they often result in weight gain once normal eating resumes.
refutes.snippet: Does it help with weight loss? The only reason why a juice cleanse may cause weight loss is because it restricts calories. It's essentially a crash diet ...

refutes.title: Everything You Need to Know About Starting a Juice Cleanse
refutes.evidence_summary: The evidence indicates that while some studies have shown initial weight loss from detox diets, including juice cleanses, the overall quality of these studies is low and there is no compelling research supporting their effectiveness for long-term weight management or immune system benefits.
refutes.snippet: The benefits vary among individuals, [but] general advantages of this practice may encompass weight loss ... immune system. How often should you do a juice ...

mixed.title: Do Juice Cleanses Detox the Body? | URMC Newsroom
mixed.evidence_summary: The evidence indicates that a three-day juice cleanse can lead to significant weight loss and changes in gut microbiota, which may support immune function, but it does not definitively establish that it bolsters the immune system or aids fat loss beyond the initial weight loss observed.
mixed.snippet: Nutrients in juice include antioxidants, which are crucial for supporting our immune systems and protecting against chronic conditions like ...

mixed.title: Health benefit of vegetable/fruit juice-based diet: Role of microbiome
mixed.evidence_summary: The evidence indicates that a three-day juice cleanse can lead to significant weight loss and alterations in gut microbiota, which may support immune function and fat loss, although it also notes a lack of comprehensive scientific evidence for these health benefits.
mixed.snippet: A 3-day juice-based diet altered the intestinal microbiota associated with weight loss, increase in the vasodilator NO, and decrease in lipid oxidation.

mixed.title: Juice Cleanse: Benefits, Risks, and Research - Health
mixed.evidence_summary: The evidence indicates that a three-day juice cleanse can lead to significant weight loss and changes in gut microbiota, but it does not explicitly support the claim that it bolsters the immune system. While there are mentions of polyphenols having immunomodulatory effects, the overall evidence does not confirm a direct benefit to the immune system from the juice cleanse itself.
mixed.snippet: A juice cleanse may aid weight loss and clear toxins, but it can also increase blood sugar and cause dehydration.
